channel.title: car.2016-03-001 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in car.2016-03-001 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: WhoAmI as Parameter
item.description: Detects a suspicious process command line that uses whoami as first parameter (as e.g. used by EfsPotato)

item.title: Renamed Whoami Execution
item.description: Detects the execution of whoami that has been renamed to a different name to avoid detection

item.title: Whoami Execution
item.description: Detects the execution of whoami, which is often used by attackers after exloitation / privilege escalation but rarely used by administrators

item.title: Whoami Execution Anomaly
item.description: Detects the execution of whoami with suspicious parents or parameters

item.title: Network Reconnaissance Activity
item.description: Detects a set of suspicious network related commands often used in recon stages
